name: Mum Attack
description:
"Hello and welcome to the hottest show of the moment: Mum Attack ! In order to elect THE best mom of the game, the candidates will compete in crazy and fun minigames ! "

Most of the minigames are playable with ZQSD for the Player 1 and the arrow keys for Player 2.

SUMOm

(Sumo + Mom)

Rules:

Spam the arrows that are showed and eject your opponent !

Controls: M.I.L.F

(Module d'Infanterie Léthal Féministe | Feminist Lethal Infantry Module)

Rules:

Explode the tank of your opponent before the time is out ! 

Controls: Mumic

(Mum + Mimic)

Rules:

Reproduce the sequence before yout opponent !   

Controls:

Mum Attack is a 2 player Party Game that is playable on the same computer. We created this prototype during our formation, as part of an exercise of "Rapid Prototyping" (Create a prototype within a certain period of time).

We were also dealing with certain requirements:

  • At least 3 Mini Games
  • A High replay value
  • Some Unique Selling Points
  • Only one client app
  • At least 2 players, that have to play simultaneously
  • A not serious and broadly attractive topic

 So we decide to create a game that took place in a crazy show (like the japanese ones) that offers to the world mum fights ! And to put more in evidence the comedy mood of the game, we chose an artistic direction that reminds the funny animations that can me found on youtube (Like Deotoons or Colas Bim).

It was really cool working on that project ! 

 -Leeroy DOBARIA: Coder / Lead Programmer / Project Manager
